name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Lingo App - Translate Subtitles & Text anywhere

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn languages with your favorite content. On any website. Over 180+ languages supported.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed by a team of expats who understand the challenges of learning a new language firsthand. It’s built to make language learning more intuitive and engaging through the content you consume, rather than traditional grammar-focused methods.

 • Translate Anything: Instantly translate subtitles for any video or selected text on any webpage, with support for 180+ languages.
 • Organize Your Learning: Save translations to a shared vocabulary list or keep them grouped by the specific videos and texts they came from.
 • Train and Retain: Strengthen your learning with flashcards, pair matching, writing exercises, and more.
 • Discover and Connect: Explore a library of curated word lists, texts, and translations, and see what other users are learning.
 • Track Your Journey: Access your watching history, learning progress, and vocabulary insights via a connected website portal.

Created by language learners for language learners, this extension seamlessly combines entertainment and education. Install now to start exploring languages your way.
